name: Pacsafe Coversafe X75 RFID Neck Pouch - Unisex
description: The quick hands of practiced pickpockets don’t stand a chance against this soft neck wallet. A slash proof strap and RFID blocking material safeguard your chip cards and ID.75-denier polyester with a 200-denier lining and PU coating for water resistance.Soft touch breathable backing is soft against your skin.Adjustable neck cord has a strong wire inside, making it impossible to slash.Adjustable drop height to fit any body.Zippered main compartment and an open slot pocket.RFID blocking material for added security.
